title: Valartis détient la quasi-majorité d'ENR Russia
cleaned_sentences: Zurich (AWP) - The Valartis banking group now holds 97.9% of ENR Russia Invest's actions capital, the two companies announced on Wednesday.
The Zugois establishment so far held 63.2% of the Geneva participation company.
This increase in participation is the result of the sale of the shares held by Valartis in Athris Holding to the latter.
In exchange, Valartis received 892,703 shares ENR Russia Invest, as well as a cash payment.
Athris Holding, Georg Von Opel participation company listed on the Bern BX Stock Exchange, so far held about a third of ENR Russia Invest.
The operation must be finalized in the coming days at a price of 5.59 Swiss francs per share ENR and must translate this year by an accounting profit of an amount "in a million to a figure".
